ThenActions.Title: %ExecutingMacro%
ThenActions.Prompt:
Macro '%ExecutingThisMacro%' must be executed using "with parameter".
The parameter must be in this format:

text|width|varname

text:			The text to be wrapped.
width:		The maximum width before wrapping.
varname:		The name of the variable to recieve the result.

ThenActions.Title: %ExecutingMacro%
ThenActions.ActionName: Prompt error with cancel: 'An error has occurred'
